name: Desktop Impostor
description:
please consider donating if you like my work!

I have created an impostor for your desktop.

He'll nab your mouse,  leave you a message, deliver you memes? And much more!!Play our favorite game with a desktop buddy who will disturb you!!

This project is in development 

We have a Discord Server! https://discord.gg/tNgDjpDCTu

Supports macOS, Linux, and Windows
